description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Enjoy the fun of flying while exploring the beautiful island. Try to land anywhere on the island. You can't believe you came safely to a full stop on the ground? Check out the replay function where you can examine in detail with all available cameras how you made it happen! Save the best part of the replay to show off your flying skills to your friends!
